p: The health impacts of a reduction in air pollution were quantified by modelling the relationship between these factors and mortality, based on meta-analytical estimates displayed in Table 3. For coronary events and lung cancer, Hazard Risk (HR) indicators are applied. Relative risk values for the diseases have been obtained by carrying out a systematic review including meta-analysis of large, international epidemiological studies [ 41, 42, 43, 44, 45, 46].
